page.title: 19LOCAL CHARACTER OF ELMBRIDGE
page.content: Local character born in Randan Woods. When talking to him he was wearing brown smock with string round his waist. We talked sitting on bench seats in his kitchen, his farm dog by his side. Joined by his son they told of their only outings in the year to the Royal Show and weekly to Kidderminster market. His spare time is spent gardening and fishing in his own pool which he cleaned out two years ago and with help from Severn Trent water board stocked with perch and trout, which the local herons would enjoy if allowed. An early riser he walks half the farm before breakfast inspecting stock and pool. All vegetables home grown, he gives ladies posies of flowers from his country style garden of old fashioned flowers and shrubs. A teller of tales recomends good food hard work laughter
